verses.verse: Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, Keep <S%H8104><s%> ye judgment <S%H4941><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H6666><s%>: for my salvation <S%H3444><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> to come <S%H935><s%>, and my righteousness <S%H6666><s%> to be revealed <S%H1540><s%>.

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H582><s%> that doeth <S%H6213><s%> this, and the son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> that layeth hold <S%H2388><s%> on it; that keepeth <S%H8104><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> from polluting <S%H2490><s%> it, and keepeth <S%H8104><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from doing <S%H6213><s%> any evil <S%H7451><s%>.

¶ Neither let the son <S%H1121><s%> of the stranger <S%H5236><s%>, that hath joined <S%H3867><s%> himself to the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, speak <S%H559><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath utterly <S%H914><s%> separated <S%H914><s%> me from his people <S%H5971><s%>: neither let the eunuch <S%H5631><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, Behold, I am a dry <S%H3002><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> that keep <S%H8104><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, and choose <S%H977><s%> the things that please <S%H2654><s%> me, and take hold <S%H2388><s%> of my covenant <S%H1285><s%>;

Even unto them will I give <S%H5414><s%> in mine house <S%H1004><s%> and within my walls <S%H2346><s%> a place <S%H3027><s%> and a name <S%H8034><s%> better <S%H2896><s%> than of sons <S%H1121><s%> and of daughters <S%H1323><s%>: I will give <S%H5414><s%> them an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, that shall not be cut off <S%H3772><s%>.

Also the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the stranger <S%H5236><s%>, that join <S%H3867><s%> themselves to the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, to serve <S%H8334><s%> him, and to love <S%H157><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, to be his servants <S%H5650><s%>, every one that keepeth <S%H8104><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> from polluting <S%H2490><s%> it, and taketh hold <S%H2388><s%> of my covenant <S%H1285><s%>;

Even them will I bring <S%H935><s%> to my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>, and make them joyful <S%H8055><s%> in my house <S%H1004><s%> of prayer <S%H8605><s%>: their burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> and their sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> shall be accepted <S%H7522><s%> upon mine altar <S%H4196><s%>; for mine house <S%H1004><s%> shall be called <S%H7121><s%> an house <S%H1004><s%> of prayer <S%H8605><s%> for all people <S%H5971><s%>.

The Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> which gathereth <S%H6908><s%> the outcasts <S%H1760><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%>, Yet will I gather <S%H6908><s%> others to him, beside those that are gathered <S%H6908><s%> unto him.
¶ All ye beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, come <S%H857><s%> to devour <S%H398><s%>, yea, all ye beasts <S%H2416><s%> in the forest <S%H3293><s%>.

His watchmen <S%H6822><s%> are blind <S%H5787><s%>: they are all ignorant <S%H3045><s%>, they are all dumb <S%H483><s%> dogs <S%H3611><s%>, they cannot <S%H3201><s%> bark <S%H5024><s%>; sleeping <S%H1957><s%>, lying down <S%H7901><s%>, loving <S%H157><s%> to slumber <S%H5123><s%>.

Yea, they are greedy <S%H5794><s%> <S%H5315><s%> dogs <S%H3611><s%> which can <S%H3045><s%> never have <S%H3045><s%> enough <S%H7654><s%>, and they are shepherds <S%H7462><s%> that cannot understand <S%H995><s%>: they all look <S%H6437><s%> to their own way <S%H1870><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> for his gain <S%H1215><s%>, from his quarter <S%H7097><s%>.

Come <S%H857><s%> ye, say they, I will fetch <S%H3947><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%>, and we will fill <S%H5433><s%> ourselves with strong drink <S%H7941><s%>; and to morrow <S%H4279><s%> shall be as this day <S%H3117><s%>, and much <S%H3966><s%> more <S%H3499><s%> abundant <S%H1419><s%>.
